actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on [(+/-)-2-(2,4-dichlorphenyl)-3-(1H-1,2,4-triazole-1-yl) propyl, 1,1,2,2-tetrafluoroethyl ether].

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on [(+/-)-2-(2,4-dichlorphenyl)-3-(1H-1,2,4-triazole-1-yl) propyl, 1,1,2,2-tetrafluoroethyl ether].

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on [(+/-)-2-(2,4-dichlorphenyl)-3-(1H-1,2,4-triazole-1-yl) propyl, 1,1,2,2-tetrafluoroethyl ether].
